title: Pea Soup
description: Traditional pea soup
instructions: Soak peas overnight
Boil with vegetables
Serve with mustard and ham

title: Smörgåstårta
description: Layered sandwich cake with various fillings
instructions: Prepare sandwich layers
Add fillings
Decorate the cake

title: Cinnamon Buns
description: Sweet and aromatic cinnamon buns
instructions: Prepare dough
Roll with cinnamon sugar
Bake until golden

title: Raggmunk
description: Crispy potato pancakes served with lingonberry sauce
instructions: Grate potatoes
Fry until golden brown
Serve with lingonberry sauce

title: Blueberry Soup
description: Sweet and refreshing blueberry soup
instructions: Boil blueberries with sugar
Serve chilled
Add a scoop of vanilla ice cream

title: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: A classic Italian main course with meat sauce
instructions: Fry onion and garlic
Add minced meat and tomato sauce
Cook spaghetti separately

title: Croissant
description: Light and airy French croissants
instructions: Mix dough
Cut and shape croissants
Bake until golden brown

title: Paella
description: A Spanish-inspired rice dish with seafood and chicken
instructions: Sear chicken and seafood
Add rice and broth
Simmer until rice is cooked

title: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
description: Creamy Alfredo pasta with grilled chicken
instructions: Cook fettuccine pasta
Grill chicken and slice
Prepare creamy Alfredo sauce
Combine and serve

title: Sushi Rolls
description: Assorted sushi rolls with fresh seafood
instructions: Prepare sushi rice
Finely chop the ingredients, fish, and seafood
Place the rice on the seaweed, add the remaining ingredients and roll into a roll
Cut the roll into fine pieces
Serve on nice plates

title: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: Classic Caesar salad with grilled chicken
instructions: Grill chicken and slice
Toss romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing
Top with grilled chicken, croutons, and Parmesan

title: Mango Sticky Rice
description: Sweet Thai dessert with mango and coconut rice
instructions: Cook sticky rice with coconut milk
Slice ripe mango
Serve mango over sticky rice, drizzle with coconut sauce

title: Beef Stir-Fry
description: Quick and flavorful beef stir-fry with vegetables
instructions: Slice beef and marinate
Stir-fry beef and vegetables in a wok
Serve over rice

title: Caprese Salad
description: Fresh Italian salad with mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil
instructions: Slice mozzarella and tomatoes
Layer mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil on a plate
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar

title: Chocolate Mousse
description: Creamy and delightful chocolate mousse
instructions: Melt chocolate and let cool
Whip cream and fold in chocolate
Chill before serving

title: Guacamole
description: Creamy and delicious avocado dip
instructions: Mash avocado
Add tomato, onion, lime juice, and cilantro
Season with salt and pepper to taste

title: Enchiladas
description: Oven-baked tortilla rolls filled with meat and sauce
instructions: Cook ground beef until browned and cooked through.
Chop the onion and add it to the ground beef. Cook until the onion is soft and translucent.
Lightly heat the tortillas in a dry skillet or microwave to make them more pliable.
Evenly distribute the beef mixture over the tortillas and roll them up into rolls.
Place the filled tortilla rolls in a baking dish.
Pour enchilada sauce over the tortilla rolls to cover completely.
Grate the cheese and sprinkle over the enchilada sauce.
Bake in the oven at 200°C for about 15-20 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Serve the enchiladas hot and enjoy the Mexican flavor!

title: Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta with creamy egg sauce, pancetta, and grated Parmesan.
instructions: Cook the pasta according to the package instructions.
Fry pancetta or bacon until crispy in a frying pan.
Mix eggs, grated Parmesan, and black pepper in a bowl.
Drain the pasta and mix with the egg mixture.
Add fried pancetta or bacon and mix well.
Serve immediately and top with more grated Parmesan and black pepper to taste.

title: Margherita Pizza
description: A simple and classic Italian pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and basil.
instructions: Roll out pizza dough on a baking sheet and spread tomato sauce evenly over the dough.
Dice the mozzarella and distribute over the tomato sauce.
Sprinkle with fresh basil and a little salt.
Bake in the oven at the highest temperature until the pizza is golden brown and bubbling, about 10-12 minutes.
Serve immediately and enjoy the Italian classic!

title: Tiramisu
description: A delicious Italian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers, mascarpone cream, and cocoa.
instructions: Mix coffee and marsala wine in a bowl.
Dip ladyfingers in the coffee mixture and layer at the bottom of a dish.
Whisk mascarpone, sugar, and vanilla extract in another bowl.
Spread a layer of mascarpone cream over the ladyfingers.
Repeat with another layer of dipped ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.
Chill tiramisu in the refrigerator and let set for at least 4 hours, or overnight.
Dust with cocoa just before serving.
Slice and serve the delightful Italian dessert to your guests!

title: Greek Salad
description: A fresh and healthy salad with vegetables, olives, feta cheese, and a simple dressing.
instructions: Dice or slice tomatoes, cucumber, bell pepper, and onion.
Pit olives and cut feta cheese into chunks.
Combine vegetables, olives, and feta cheese in a large bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and squeeze lemon juice over.
Sprinkle with fresh oregano, salt, and black pepper to taste.
Toss well and serve immediately as a refreshing and tasty appetizer or side dish.

title: Hummus
description: A creamy and flavorful chickpea dip with garlic, tahini, and lemon.
instructions: Rinse chickpeas and blend in a food processor until smooth.
Add tahini, minced garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, cumin, and salt.
Blend until smooth and creamy, adjusting the taste with more lemon juice or salt if needed.
Serve hummus in a bowl and drizzle with extra olive oil before serving.
Garnish with fresh parsley, paprika, or roasted pine nuts if desired.

title: Dim Sum
description: A wide range of small Chinese dishes
instructions: Prepare a variety of fillings which may include meat, shrimp, vegetables, or tofu.
Prepare a thin dough of wheat flour and water.
Shape small dough pieces and then fill them with desired filling.
Steam Dim Sum in bamboo baskets for about 10-15 minutes until cooked through.
Serve Dim Sum hot along with soy sauce, ginger, and chili sauce.

title: Toast Skagen
description: Classic Swedish sandwich recipe
instructions: Peel and chop the shrimp
Mix shrimp with mayonnaise, sour cream, dill, and lemon juice
Season with salt and pepper
Lightly toast the bread slices
Spread the mixture on the toasted bread slices
Decorate with lemon slices and dill sprigs

title: Lamb Skewers with Rice
description: Juicy lamb skewers served with spiced rice and tzatziki.
instructions: Marinate the lamb in olive oil, garlic, rosemary, lemon juice, salt, and pepper for at least 2 hours.
Thread the lamb onto grill skewers and grill over open flame or in the oven until cooked through and nicely grilled.
Cook the rice according to package instructions and season with cumin, cinnamon, and a pinch of salt.
Serve the lamb skewers with the spiced rice and tzatziki. Garnish with fresh coriander or parsley.

title: Pasta Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta with creamy egg and bacon sauce.
instructions: Cook the pasta al dente according to the package instructions.
Fry the bacon until crispy and golden brown. Drain on paper towels and then chop into pieces.
Whisk together egg yolks, grated parmesan cheese, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
Drain the pasta and toss the hot pasta with the egg and cheese mixture until evenly coated.
Add the fried bacon and gently toss. Serve immediately and garnish with freshly grated parmesan cheese and black pepper.

title: Vegetarian Omelette
description: Delicious omelette filled with mushrooms, tomatoes, and cheese
instructions: Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat
Saute mushrooms and tomatoes until soft
Whisk eggs with a pinch of salt and pepper
Pour eggs into the pan and cook until set
Sprinkle cheese over half of the omelette
Fold the omelette in half and cook for another minute
Slide onto a plate and serve hot

title: Greek Yogurt Parfait
description: A healthy and delicious breakfast option featuring layers of Greek yogurt, granola, and fresh berries.
instructions: In a glass or bowl, layer Greek yogurt, granola, and fresh berries.
Repeat the layers until the glass or bowl is filled.
Top with a final layer of berries for garnish.
Serve immediately and enjoy!

title: French Beef Bourguignon
description: A classic French stew made with tender beef, red wine, vegetables, and herbs.
instructions: In a large pot, cook the chopped bacon until crisp. Remove and set aside.
In the same pot, brown the beef cubes in batches. Remove and set aside.
Add chopped onions, carrots, and garlic to the pot. Cook until softened.
Return the beef and bacon to the pot. Add red wine, beef broth, tomato paste, thyme, and bay leaves.
Simmer covered for 2 hours until beef is tender. Serve hot.

title: French Sole Meunière
description: A classic French fish dish made with delicate sole fillets coated in flour and cooked in butter.
instructions: Season sole fillets with salt and pepper.
Dredge each fillet in flour, shaking off excess.
In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat until foamy.
Add the sole fillets and cook until golden brown, about 2-3 minutes per side.
Drizzle with lemon juice and sprinkle with parsley before serving.

title: French Ratatouille
description: A classic French vegetable stew made with tomatoes, eggplant, zucchini, bell peppers, and herbs.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add chopped onions, garlic, and bell peppers. Cook until softened.
Add diced tomatoes, eggplant, and zucchini to the skillet. Cook until vegetables are tender.
Season with salt, pepper, and herbs. Serve hot or cold.

title: Thai Fish Curry
description: A flavorful Thai curry made with tender fish fillets, coconut milk, and aromatic Thai spices.
instructions: In a large pan, heat coconut milk over medium heat.
Add Thai curry paste and stir until fragrant.
Add fish fillets, vegetables, and fish sauce. Simmer until fish is cooked through.
Garnish with fresh herbs and serve hot with steamed rice.

ingredients.name: Mixed vegetables (such as bell peppers, zucchini, and carrots)
Fresh herbs (such as cilantro and Thai basil)

title: Scandinavian Grilled Salmon
description: A simple and delicious Scandinavian dish featuring grilled salmon marinated in a tangy dill sauce.
instructions: In a bowl, mix together olive oil, lemon juice, dill, and garlic.
Marinate salmon fillets in the mixture for 15-30 minutes.
Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Grill salmon for 4-5 minutes on each side, or until cooked through.
Serve hot with a side of roasted vegetables or boiled potatoes.

title: Mexican Fish Tacos
description: Delicious and zesty fish tacos made with crispy fried fish, fresh salsa, and tangy lime crema.
instructions: Prepare the fish by seasoning with spices and dredging in flour.
Fry the fish until golden and crispy.
Assemble tacos by filling tortillas with fried fish, salsa, shredded cabbage, and lime crema.
Serve hot with extra lime wedges and hot sauce on the side.

ingredients.name: Mexican spices (such as chili powder, cumin, and paprika)

title: Japanese Chicken Teriyaki
description: Tender chicken thighs glazed with a sweet and savory teriyaki sauce, served with steamed rice and vegetables.
instructions: In a bowl, mix soy sauce, mirin, brown sugar, minced garlic, and minced ginger to make the teriyaki sauce.
Heat vegetable oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Add chicken thighs to the skillet and cook until browned on both sides.
Pour the teriyaki sauce over the chicken and simmer until the sauce thickens and coats the chicken evenly.
Serve the chicken teriyaki hot with steamed rice and vegetables.
Garnish with sliced green onions and sesame seeds.

title: Chicken Caesar Wrap
description: A satisfying wrap filled with grilled chicken, crisp romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.
instructions: Grill chicken breasts until fully cooked.
Slice grilled chicken into strips.
Lay a large tortilla flat and spread Caesar dressing over it.
Place sliced grilled chicken, romaine lettuce leaves, and shredded Parmesan cheese on top of the dressing.
Wrap the tortilla tightly around the filling ingredients.
Slice the wrap in half diagonally and serve immediately.

title: Quinoa Salad with Chickpeas
description: A nutritious and protein-packed salad featuring quinoa, chickpeas, colorful vegetables, and a zesty lemon dressing.
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions and let it cool.
In a large bowl, combine cooked quinoa, drained and rinsed chickpeas, diced vegetables, and chopped parsley.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, salt, and pepper to make the dressing.
Pour the dressing over the quinoa salad and toss to coat evenly.
Chill the salad in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes before serving.
Garnish with additional parsley before serving, if desired.

title: Pad Thai
description: Pad Thai is a popular Thai stir-fried noodle dish made with rice noodles, tofu, eggs, and a flavorful sauce consisting of tamarind, fish sauce, and other seasonings. It's often garnished with crushed peanuts, lime wedges, and fresh herbs.
instructions: Soak the rice noodles in warm water until they are pliable but still slightly firm. Drain and set aside.
Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add minced garlic and diced tofu, stirring until tofu is golden brown.
Push the tofu to one side of the pan and crack eggs into the other side. Scramble the eggs until they are cooked, then mix them with the tofu.
Add the soaked rice noodles to the pan, along with
Add the prepared sauce to the pan, stirring well to coat the noodles and tofu evenly. Cook until the noodles are tender and the sauce has thickened.
Serve hot, garnished with crushed peanuts, lime wedges, and fresh herbs.

ingredients.name: Fresh herbs (such as cilantro and Thai basil)

title: Tom Yum Soup
description: A spicy and sour Thai soup flavored with lemongrass, kaffir lime leaves, and galangal.
instructions: Bring chicken or vegetable broth to a boil in a pot.
Add lemongrass, galangal, and kaffir lime leaves to the broth and simmer for 5 minutes.
Add mushrooms, cherry tomatoes, and your choice of protein (shrimp, chicken, or tofu).
Season with fish sauce, lime juice, sugar, and chili paste, according to taste.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve hot.

title: Green Curry Chicken
description: A classic Thai curry made with green curry paste, coconut milk, and chicken.
instructions: Heat green curry paste in a pan until fragrant.
Add coconut milk and bring to a simmer.
Add sliced chicken breast and simmer until cooked through.
Add sliced bamboo shoots, bell peppers, and Thai eggplant.
Season with fish sauce, sugar, and kaffir lime leaves.
Serve hot with steamed rice.

title: Grilled Salmon
description: Juicy and tender grilled salmon fillets seasoned with herbs and spices, perfect for a healthy and flavorful dinner.
instructions: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
Season salmon fillets with salt, pepper, and your choice of herbs or spices.
Grill salmon fillets skin-side down for 4-5 minutes.
Carefully flip the fillets and grill for an additional 4-5 minutes or until cooked through.
Serve grilled salmon with lemon wedges and your favorite side dishes.

title: Thai Basil Chicken Stir-Fry
description: A flavorful and aromatic stir-fry dish featuring tender chicken, fresh basil, and Thai spices.
instructions: Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat.
Add minced garlic and sliced chicken breast, stir-frying until chicken is cooked through.
Add chopped bell peppers, onions, and Thai basil leaves to the wok, stirring constantly.
Pour in a mixture of soy sauce, fish sauce, oyster sauce, and sugar.
Continue stir-frying until the vegetables are tender and the sauce has thickened.
Serve hot with steamed rice.

title: Italian Beef Lasagna
description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with layers of lasagna noodles, savory beef sauce, and creamy cheese filling.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
Cook lasagna noodles according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
In a large skillet, cook ground beef with diced onions and minced garlic until browned.
Add crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper to the skillet. Simmer for 10-15 minutes.
In a separate bowl, mix together ricotta cheese, egg, grated Parmesan cheese, and chopped parsley.
Spread a layer of meat sauce on the bottom of a baking dish. Arrange a layer of cooked lasagna noodles on top.
Spread a layer of ricotta cheese mixture over the noodles, then add another layer of meat sauce. Repeat the layers.
Top the lasagna with shredded mozzarella cheese.
Cover the baking dish with aluminum foil and bake for 30 minutes. Remove the foil and bake for an additional 15 minutes or until bubbly and golden brown.
Let the lasagna cool for a few minutes before serving.

title: Scandinavian Meatballs
description: Tender and flavorful meatballs made with a blend of ground meats and served with creamy lingonberry sauce.
instructions: In a large bowl, mix together ground beef, ground pork, breadcrumbs, minced onion, egg, salt, pepper, and allspice until well combined.
Shape the meat mixture into small meatballs, about 1 inch in diameter.
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the meatballs and brown on all sides.
Reduce the heat to medium and continue cooking until the meatballs are cooked through.
In a separate saucepan, heat lingonberry jam or lingonberry sauce until warmed through.
Serve the meatballs hot with lingonberry sauce and mashed potatoes or lingonberry sauce.
Garnish with chopped parsley, if desired.

title: Chocolate Cake
description: Decadent chocolate cake that melts in your mouth, perfect for satisfying your sweet tooth cravings.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease and flour two 9-inch round cake pans.
In a large mixing bowl, sift together flour, cocoa powder, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
In another bowl, beat together eggs, sugar, and vanilla extract until creamy and well combined.
Gradually add melted butter and buttermilk to the egg mixture, mixing until smooth.
Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and mix until just combined.
Divide the batter evenly between the prepared cake pans and smooth the tops with a spatula.
Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Remove the cakes from the oven and let them cool in the pans for 10 minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.
Once cooled, frost the cake with your favorite chocolate frosting and serve.

title: Matcha Green Tea Ice Cream
description: Creamy and refreshing ice cream with the delicate flavor of matcha green tea, perfect for hot summer days.
instructions: In a saucepan, heat heavy cream and milk over medium heat until it begins to simmer.
In a separate bowl, whisk together egg yolks and sugar until pale and creamy.
Slowly pour the hot cream mixture into the egg yolk mixture, whisking constantly to prevent curdling.
Return the mixture to the saucepan and cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until thickened enough to coat the back of a spoon.
Remove from heat and stir in matcha powder until fully combined.
Strain the mixture through a fine-mesh sieve into a clean bowl to remove any lumps.
Cover and refrigerate the mixture until completely chilled, preferably overnight.
Churn the chilled mixture in an ice cream maker according to the manufacturer's instructions.
Transfer the churned ice cream to a container and freeze for a few hours until firm.
Serve the matcha green tea ice cream garnished with whipped cream and a sprinkle of matcha powder, if desired.

title: Dorayaki
description: Soft and fluffy pancakes filled with sweet red bean paste, a popular Japanese dessert often enjoyed with tea.
instructions: In a bowl, whisk together eggs, sugar, honey, and water until well combined.
Sift flour and baking powder into the egg mixture and whisk until smooth.
Heat a non-stick pan or griddle over medium heat and lightly grease with oil or butter.
Pour a small amount of batter onto the pan to form small pancakes, about 3 inches in diameter.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook until golden brown on both sides.
Remove the pancakes from the pan and let them cool slightly.
Spread a dollop of sweet red bean paste onto one pancake, then sandwich with another pancake.
Repeat with the remaining pancakes and red bean paste.
Serve the dorayaki warm or at room temperature, and enjoy!

title: Taiyaki
description: Taiyaki is a popular Japanese fish-shaped cake filled with sweet red bean paste. Crispy on the outside and fluffy on the inside, it's a delightful treat often enjoyed fresh off the griddle.
instructions: In a bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt.
In another bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, and vanilla extract.
Gradually add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, whisking until smooth.
Heat a taiyaki pan or waffle iron and grease the molds with oil or butter.
Pour the batter into the molds, filling them halfway.
Add a spoonful of sweet red bean paste into the center of each mold.
Cover the filling with more batter, filling the molds completely.
Close the pan and cook until golden brown on both sides.
Remove the taiyaki from the pan and let them cool slightly before serving.
Enjoy the taiyaki warm, and savor the crispy exterior and soft, flavorful interior!

title: Japanese Cheesecake
description: Japanese cheesecake is a light and fluffy dessert with a delicate flavor and silky texture. Made with cream cheese, eggs, and sugar, it's a delightful treat that melts in your mouth.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 320°F (160°C). Grease and line a round cake pan with parchment paper.
In a heatproof bowl set over a pot of simmering water, melt cream cheese, butter, and milk, stirring until smooth.
Remove from heat and let the mixture cool slightly.
Whisk egg yolks and sugar together until pale and creamy.
Add the cream cheese mixture to the egg yolk mixture and whisk until well combined.
Sift in cake flour and cornstarch, and fold gently until smooth.
In a separate bowl, beat egg whites until foamy. Gradually add sugar and beat until stiff peaks form.
Fold the egg whites into the batter in three additions, being careful not to deflate the mixture.
Pour the batter into the prepared cake pan and smooth the top.
Bake in the preheated oven for about 1 hour or until the cake is set and golden brown.
Remove from the oven and let the cake cool in the pan for 10 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.
Slice and serve the Japanese cheesecake, and enjoy its light and fluffy texture!

title: Baked Cod with Lemon and Herbs
description: Baked cod with lemon and herbs is a light and flavorful dish that's easy to make and perfect for a healthy dinner. The cod fillets are seasoned with garlic, lemon zest, fresh herbs, and olive oil, then baked until tender and flaky.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Grease a baking dish with olive oil or cooking spray.
Place the cod fillets in the prepared baking dish, skin-side down.
In a small bowl, combine minced garlic, lemon zest, chopped parsley, salt, pepper, and olive oil. Mix well.
Spread the garlic and herb mixture evenly over the top of the cod fillets.
Bake the cod in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the fish is opaque and flakes easily with a fork.
Remove the baked cod from the oven and serve hot, garnished with lemon wedges and additional chopped parsley, if desired.

title: Teriyaki Glazed Salmon
description: Teriyaki glazed salmon is a delicious and flavorful dish that combines the sweetness of teriyaki sauce with the richness of salmon. The salmon fillets are marinated in a homemade teriyaki sauce, then grilled or baked to perfection.
instructions: In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, brown sugar, minced garlic, grated ginger, and sesame oil to make the teriyaki sauce.
Place the salmon fillets in a shallow dish and pour half of the teriyaki sauce over them. Reserve the remaining sauce for basting.
Cover the dish and marinate the salmon in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes, or up to 1 hour.
Preheat the grill or oven to medium-high heat. Oil the grill grates or line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Remove the salmon from the marinade and shake off any excess. Discard the marinade.
Grill or bake the salmon for 4-5 minutes per side, basting with the reserved teriyaki sauce, until the salmon is cooked through and caramelized on the outside.
Transfer the teriyaki glazed salmon to a serving platter and garnish with sliced green onions and sesame seeds. Serve hot.

title: Tuna Salad
description: Tuna salad is a classic dish that's perfect for sandwiches, wraps, or serving over greens. It's made with canned tuna, crunchy vegetables, and a creamy dressing, and it comes together in minutes.
instructions: In a large bowl, combine canned tuna, diced celery, diced red onion, chopped dill pickles, mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, lemon juice, salt, and black pepper.
Mix all ingredients until well combined. Taste and adjust seasoning, if necessary.
Chill the tuna salad in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes before serving to allow the flavors to meld together.
Serve the tuna salad on sandwiches, wraps, or over a bed of lettuce. Enjoy!

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: A popular Indian dish consisting of marinated and grilled chicken chunks in a creamy tomato-based sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken chunks in yogurt, lemon juice, and spices for 30 minutes.
Grill marinated chicken until cooked through.
In a separate pan, sauté onions, garlic, ginger, and spices until fragrant.
Add tomato puree and cream to the pan, simmer until the sauce thickens.
Add grilled chicken to the sauce, simmer for another 10 minutes. Serve hot.

ingredients.name: Spices (cumin, coriander, paprika, turmeric, garam masala)

title: Palak Paneer
description: A nutritious Indian dish made with spinach and paneer (Indian cottage cheese) in a creamy sauce.
instructions: Blanch spinach leaves in boiling water, then shock in ice water. Blend into a smooth paste.
Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger until golden brown.
Add spinach puree, spices, and cream. Simmer until flavors blend.
Add cubed paneer and cook until heated through. Serve hot.

title: Rogan Josh
description: A flavorful Indian curry made with tender lamb cooked in a rich and aromatic sauce.
instructions: Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger in ghee until golden brown.
Add lamb pieces and brown on all sides.
Add yogurt, tomato puree, and spices. Cook until lamb is tender.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve hot with rice or naan.

ingredients.name: Spices (cumin, coriander, paprika, turmeric, garam masala)
